ing: 1/2 fresh pineapple - peeled, cored, and chopped
des: "I created this smoothie recipe one morning to use up a pineapple I had. Even my husband, who doesn't care for smoothies, loved it!"
ins: Blend pineapple, yogurt, banana, and orange juice together in a blender until smooth. Add ice and blend until ice is completely crushed and incorporated.
